title: Implement pluggable LLM for Model evaluator
description: Add concrete LLM integration for ModelEvaluator. Currently uses metrics fallback. Support pluggable providers (Claude API, OpenAI, local). Build comparison prompt with diffs and parse ranked response.

title: Build TUI dashboard with ratatui
description:
Create the TUI interface:
- Symphony view: show all active agents in split panes
- Focus view: full terminal for single agent
- Keyboard navigation (j/k, Enter to zoom in, Esc to zoom out)
- Status bar showing integrations and agent count
- Header with Rembrandt branding

title: Implement agent spawning via PTY
description:
Wire up the spawn command to:
- Create a git worktree for the agent
- Launch the agent process in a PTY
- Track the session in AgentRegistry
- Handle agent type detection and command resolution

title: Integrate Agent Mail MCP for file reservations
description:
Connect to MCP Agent Mail server:
- Reserve files when agent starts working
- Release reservations on completion
- Show reservation conflicts in UI
- Display messages from other agents

title: Wire CompetitionManager to agent spawning
description: Connect CompetitionManager.start_competition() to actual agent process spawning. Currently CLI parses and validates but doesn't spawn agents. Depends on rembrandt-5mq (PTY spawning).

title: Implement attach/detach for agent terminals
description:
Allow zooming into agent terminals:
- Attach to agent PTY session
- Forward keyboard input to agent
- Display agent output in real-time
- Detach without killing agent (Ctrl+D or Esc)

title: Implement merge command with pq check
description:
Merge agent work back to main:
- Run pq check on changed files
- Warn on decision violations
- Auto-merge if clean
- Queue for review if conflicts
- Update Beads issue status on completion

title: Implement coach TUI for human evaluator
description: Build ratatui interface for human evaluation in competition mode. Shows all solutions at a glance, diffs on demand, model reasoning, and allows override selection. Coach observes and guides rather than micromanages.

title: Add Beads integration for task assignment
description:
Integrate with Beads for task coordination:
- Show bd ready tasks in dashboard
- Assign task to agent on spawn (--task flag)
- Update task status (in_progress) when agent starts
- Mark complete when merged

comments.author: davegraham
comments.text: Beads v0.40.0 adds native worktree support: bd worktree command, shared .beads database across worktrees, worktree-aware discovery. Agents in Rembrandt worktrees can now share task context without conflicts. See beads docs/WORKTREES.md for integration details.

title: Implement worktree lifecycle management
description:
Complete WorktreeManager implementation:
- Create worktrees with proper branch naming (rembrandt/<agent-id>)
- Cleanup completed worktrees
- List active worktrees
- Handle cleanup --all flag

title: Persist agent sessions in SQLite
description:
Add state persistence:
- Create state.db in .rembrandt/
- Store active sessions across restarts
- Track worktree paths, branches, PIDs
- Clean up stale sessions on startup
